title: MathML scripted elements
summary: In this article, we've finished reviewing basic layout introducing elements <msub>, <msup>, <msubsup>, <munder>, <mover>, <munderover> for subscripts, superscripts, underscripts and overscripts. Using these elements, we were able to briefly introduce new properties of the <mo> element. In the next article, we will continue focus on tabular layout.
pageTitle: MathML scripted elements - Learn web development | MDN
